reference.shortdesc: A step example illustrates a step of a task.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: The step example can be a couple of words, or an entire paragraph.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The stepxmp element is specialized from the itemgroup element in the topic module.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <step> <cmd>Type a name for the widget.</cmd> <stepxmp>For example, <userinput>mywidget</userinput></stepxmp> </step>
